messages.content: Thank you for calling Nestlé customer service. My name is Davinci. How may I assist you today? May I know your name, please?
Hi Davinci, my name is Lucy. I have a question regarding a payment for the Gerber Goodstart Gentle Pro.
Nice to meet you, Lucy. How can I help you with the payment for Gerber Goodstart Gentle Pro?
I recently purchased the product, but I am not sure if my payment went through. Can you help me check the status?
Of course, Lucy. Could you please provide me with your order number or any other relevant details so I can look it up for you?
Thank you, Lucy. Please hold on for a moment while I check the payment status for your order.
Lucy, I have verified the details and it appears that your payment was successfully processed. You should have received a confirmation email as well. Is there anything else you need help with?
Great, thanks for confirming that. I was just worried because I didn't see the email immediately. That's all for now.
You're welcome, Lucy. If you have any more questions in the future, feel free to reach out to us. Have a great day!
